scripts.build:types: npx rimraf @bizhermit && npx cpx src/**/*.{ts,tsx} @bizhermit/basic-utils/dist && npx tsc -p src/tsconfig.types.json --emitDeclarationOnly && npx rimraf @bizhermit
scripts.build: npx rimraf dist CREDIT && npx license -o CREDIT --returnError && npx tsc -p src/tsconfig.json && npx minifier dist && npm run build:types
scripts.prepare: npm run build && git add -A && git diff --quiet --exit-code --cached || git commit -m "build v%npm_package_version%" && git push origin
scripts.postpublish: git tag && git push origin tags/v%npm_package_version%
